greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numerators of rational valued sequence whose Dirichlet convolution with itself yields A235199, which is a multiplicative permutation of natural numbers.
comment: Question: Are all terms positive? No negative terms in range 1 .. 2^18. Also checked up to n = 2^18 that the denominators match with A299150.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
formula: a(n) = numerator of f(n), where f(1) = 1, f(n) = (1/2) * (A235199(n) - Sum_{d|n, d>1, d<n} f(d) * f(n/d)) for n > 1.
program: A235199(n) = if(n<=4,n,my(f = factor(n)); for(i=1, #f~, if(5==f[i,1], f[i,1] += 2, if(7==f[i,1], f[i,1] -= 2, my(k=primepi(f[i,1])); if(k>4, f[i,1] = prime(A235199(k)))))); factorback(f));
DirSqrt(v) = {my(n=#v, u=vector(n)); u[1]=1; for(n=2, n, u[n]=(v[n]/v[1] - sumdiv(n, d, if(d>1&&d<n, u[d]*u[n/d], 0)))/2); u}; \\ From A317937.
xref: Cf. A235199, A299150 (seems to give the denominators).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 23 2018
